name: aspnet5mvcwebpack
description: ASP.NET5 Core MVC project with npm and webpack 5 front-end configuration.

scripts.webpack:Debug: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development NODE_ENV=Development homepage='/' webpack --mode development
scripts.webpack:Release: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production NODE_ENV=Production homepage='/ASPNET5MVCWEBPACK/' webpack --mode production
